title: Gulf Islands National Seashore: Cooperating Association
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park     Cooperating Association              Cooperating Association       Eastern National, a 501(c)3 cooperating association and eParks.com, its e-commerce website, was formed to support the educational, interpretive and conservation programs of the National Park Service.  Over the years, Eastern National donations have funded special events, signage for trails and exhibits, publications, interpretive programs, research grants, internships, the purchase of historical artifacts, park programs for kids, reenactments, interpretive exhibits and much more. Eastern National is proud to provide the Passport to Your National ParksÂ® iPhone app for all who enjoy America's national parks! And, we have plans to make it available for other smart phone devices in the future.
